sentences: Tommy Onyx (born May 7, 1972) is a musician from Detroit, Michigan.
He is best known as the producer of Inner City's 1999 remix of Good Life, which made #10 on the UK Singles Chart.
He moved to Detroit from Boston in 1988 and soon came to local prominence as keyboard player with the Alt Rock band The Charm Farm.
He co-wrote many of the band's iconic songs including "Hallelujah," the title track from the band's second album "Fire" and most recently 2014's "Bad Girl," a tribute to Donna Summer.
